attributes.action: UK Opinion Survey- the average mans views
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to call for a national public opinion survey. For the average person to be heard

It has occured to me that a very small amount of people in government have 62.3million British people’s lives in their hand. They make decision on our behalf and spend our money how they see fit. I am not naive enough to think that I have any idea about the complexity of running a country but I would like to have my say on how their decision effect my life.

The survey should be a brief document asking about things such as immigration, healthcare, way of life, caring for the elderly and issues about violence, gangs and punishment etc.

I am living my one life by other people rules and to be honest they are making it hell. So maybe by stating our views as a country we will be heard.
